name: Animal Flow Connect
description:
It is a puzzle game challenges your perspicacity and agility! Pair up 2 same animal, which can be connected by a line folded no more than 2 times

Features:
- Classic game play and cute kawaii graphics
- Classic onet connect animal puzzle
- Cool visual effect and well-designed interface
- Four kinds of interfacial design free for you
- Challenge your eye count and ability to calculate
